category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: SUBSCMPL_IMDS_Part_Declaration_Class_Type
preference.preference_description: Defines the International Material Data System (IMDS) Part Declaration object type. This would be used to maintain history of declarations for Vendor or Vendor Part.
